full_summary:
### Government of Canada Tender Announcement

#### Tenders for Remotely Piloted Aircraft System (RPAS)

The **Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)** is seeking the delivery of multiple Remotely Piloted Aircraft Systems (RPAS) to be used within Canada's aerospace.

### Solicitation Details

* ** Tender Reference Number**: CB-694-97865607
* **Solicitation Number**: M5000-24-3676/A
* **Amendment Number**: 3
* **Publication and Closing Dates**: The tender notice was published on May 21, 2024, and the closing date is June 6, 2024, at 16:00:00.
* **Expected Contract Dates**: The contract start date is June 14, 2024, and the expected end date of the contract is June 30, 2024.

### Contract Requirements

The RCMP requires the delivery of RPAS that meet specific requirements for operation in Canadian airspace. The successful bidder will be responsible for the procurement and delivery of the RPAS, along with any associated services.

### Evaluation and Selection Criteria

Tenders will be evaluated based on technical criteria, including the ability of the RPAS to operate in various weather conditions across the province. The bidder with the lowest evaluated price and meeting the mandatory technical evaluation criteria will be recommended for contract award.

### Special Considerations

The procurement has been conditionally set aside for Indigenous businesses. In order to be considered, the bidder must certify that it qualifies as an Indigenous business as defined under the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Businesses and agrees to comply with all requirements of this strategy. 

### Tender Documents

Tender documents are available at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/38574/rcmp\_solicitation-m5000-24-3676a\_amendment\_001-eng-fre.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/38574/rcmp\_solicitation-m5000-24-3676a\_amendment\_001-eng-fre.pdf), and [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/38574/m5000-24-3676a-rfp-eng\_2.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/38574/m5000-24-3676a-rfp-eng\_
